project_abstract.cdata: The project would improve the productivity of tree crops agriculture, and consequently improve the economic situation of smallholder farmers. It would cover new planting and rehabilitation of coconut with systematic intercropping; pepper rehabilitation; cashew development; establishment of seed gardens; and processing of smallholders rubber. Support to smallholders for agricultural development is provided mainly in the form of long-term institutional credit and special extension services. Other support services included are research, technical assistance and training.
